en-US.pollOptionTitleDescription: Sets the title of the poll.
en-US.pollOptionDescriptionDescription: The polls description... Create a newline in the poll description by typing \n
en-US.pollOptionItemsDescription: Items to vote on. SEPARATE EACH ITEM WITH A COMMA ( , )
en-US.pollOptionPublicDescription: Allows you to make the results of the poll public at all times, even before you close the poll.
en-US.pollOptionThreadDescription: Attach a thread to the poll?
en-US.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
en-US.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
en-US.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.
en-US.memberNoPermsNoRole: Sorry! You don't have the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or "Poll Manager" role.
en-US.pollTooManyItems: Sorry! The poll you tried to create has more than 25 items (%s) unfortunately this is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
en-US.pollHasDuplicates:
Sorry! You attempted to create a poll with duplicate items. Please check your command and avoid putting identical cases.

ex. `one,one`

**NOTE**: If you create a poll like `one, one` it will be valid and upload (due to the space) I can't promise that this will produce stable results for you but if you absolutely require the same poll items that is how you can do it.
en-US.pollItemTooLong: Sorry! One of the items in your poll exceeded **100** characters please recreate the poll and use less characters on one of your poll items. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
en-US.embedTitleTooLong: Sorry! The title of your poll exceeded **256** chracters please recreate the poll and use less characters in the title. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
en-US.embedDescriptionTooLong: Sorry! the description of your poll exceeded **4096** characters please reacreate the oikk abd yse less charactersin the description. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
en-US.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
en-US.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
en-US.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
en-US.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
en-US.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
en-US.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
en-US.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
en-US.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
en-US.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.
en-US.helpCommandDescription: Information on creating votes / helpful links.
en-US.helpDescription: All information is avaliable on our [GitHub](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) or the [Support Discord](https://discord.gg/VZkY8mDJGh).
en-US.privacyDescription:
```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
en-US.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
en-US.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

fr.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
fr.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.
fr.helpCommandDescription: Information on creating votes / helpful links.
fr.helpDescription: All information is avaliable on our [GitHub](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) or the [Support Discord](https://discord.gg/VZkY8mDJGh).
fr.privacyDescription:
```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
fr.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
fr.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

hr.pollOptionTitleDescription: Sets the title of the poll.
hr.pollOptionDescriptionDescription: The polls description... Create a newline in the poll description by typing \n
hr.pollOptionItemsDescription: Items to vote on. SEPARATE EACH ITEM WITH A COMMA ( , )
hr.pollOptionPublicDescription: Allows you to make the results of the poll public at all times, even before you close the poll.
hr.pollOptionThreadDescription: Attach a thread to the poll?
hr.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
hr.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
hr.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.
hr.memberNoPermsNoRole: Sorry! You don't have the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or "Poll Manager" role.
hr.pollTooManyItems: Sorry! The poll you tried to create has more than 25 items (%s) unfortunately this is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
hr.pollHasDuplicates:
Sorry! You attempted to create a poll with duplicate items. Please check your command and avoid putting identical cases.

ex. `one,one`

**NOTE**: If you create a poll like `one, one` it will be valid and upload (due to the space) I can't promise that this will produce stable results for you but if you absolutely require the same poll items that is how you can do it.
hr.pollItemTooLong: Sorry! One of the items in your poll exceeded **100** characters please recreate the poll and use less characters on one of your poll items. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
hr.embedTitleTooLong: Sorry! The title of your poll exceeded **256** chracters please recreate the poll and use less characters in the title. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
hr.embedDescriptionTooLong: Sorry! the description of your poll exceeded **4096** characters please reacreate the oikk abd yse less charactersin the description. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
hr.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
hr.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
hr.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
hr.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
hr.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
hr.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
hr.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
hr.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
hr.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.

no.embedDescriptionTooLong: Sorry! the description of your poll exceeded **4096** characters please reacreate the oikk abd yse less charactersin the description. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
no.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
no.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
no.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
no.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
no.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
no.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
no.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
no.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
no.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.
no.helpCommandDescription: Information on creating votes / helpful links.
no.helpDescription: All information is avaliable on our [GitHub](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) or the [Support Discord](https://discord.gg/VZkY8mDJGh).
no.privacyDescription:
```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
no.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
no.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

pl.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
pl.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
pl.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.

ex. `one,one`

vi.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
vi.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
vi.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.
vi.memberNoPermsNoRole: Sorry! You don't have the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or "Poll Manager" role.
vi.pollTooManyItems: Sorry! The poll you tried to create has more than 25 items (%s) unfortunately this is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
vi.pollHasDuplicates:
Sorry! You attempted to create a poll with duplicate items. Please check your command and avoid putting identical cases.

ex. `one,one`

**NOTE**: If you create a poll like `one, one` it will be valid and upload (due to the space) I can't promise that this will produce stable results for you but if you absolutely require the same poll items that is how you can do it.
vi.pollItemTooLong: Sorry! One of the items in your poll exceeded **100** characters please recreate the poll and use less characters on one of your poll items. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
vi.embedTitleTooLong: Sorry! The title of your poll exceeded **256** chracters please recreate the poll and use less characters in the title. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
vi.embedDescriptionTooLong: Sorry! the description of your poll exceeded **4096** characters please reacreate the oikk abd yse less charactersin the description. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
vi.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
vi.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
vi.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
vi.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
vi.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
vi.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
vi.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
vi.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
vi.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.
vi.helpCommandDescription: Information on creating votes / helpful links.
vi.helpDescription: All information is avaliable on our [GitHub](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) or the [Support Discord](https://discord.gg/VZkY8mDJGh).
vi.privacyDescription:
```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
vi.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
vi.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
ru.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
ru.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

uk.pollOptionTitleDescription: Sets the title of the poll.
uk.pollOptionDescriptionDescription: The polls description... Create a newline in the poll description by typing \n
uk.pollOptionItemsDescription: Items to vote on. SEPARATE EACH ITEM WITH A COMMA ( , )
uk.pollOptionPublicDescription: Allows you to make the results of the poll public at all times, even before you close the poll.
uk.pollOptionThreadDescription: Attach a thread to the poll?
uk.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
uk.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
uk.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.
uk.memberNoPermsNoRole: Sorry! You don't have the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or "Poll Manager" role.
uk.pollTooManyItems: Sorry! The poll you tried to create has more than 25 items (%s) unfortunately this is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
uk.pollHasDuplicates:
Sorry! You attempted to create a poll with duplicate items. Please check your command and avoid putting identical cases.

ex. `one,one`

**NOTE**: If you create a poll like `one, one` it will be valid and upload (due to the space) I can't promise that this will produce stable results for you but if you absolutely require the same poll items that is how you can do it.
uk.pollItemTooLong: Sorry! One of the items in your poll exceeded **100** characters please recreate the poll and use less characters on one of your poll items. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
uk.embedTitleTooLong: Sorry! The title of your poll exceeded **256** chracters please recreate the poll and use less characters in the title. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
uk.embedDescriptionTooLong: Sorry! the description of your poll exceeded **4096** characters please reacreate the oikk abd yse less charactersin the description. This is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
uk.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
uk.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
uk.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
uk.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
uk.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
uk.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
uk.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
uk.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
uk.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.

zh-TW.couldNotCreateMessageBody: Sorry! For some reason I could not send the message for the poll. This error occurs very rarely, please create a ticket on our support server and tell us everything you can about what you did while creating the poll.
zh-TW.threadCreateErrorDescription:
An error occured while creating the thread for the poll.

Please add the `MANAGE_THREADS` and the `CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS` permission to access this feature.
zh-TW.publicPollUpdateVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
zh-TW.publicPollNewVoteEmbedError: There has been an error updating the mssage to display the new results, please note that your results have been saved.
zh-TW.closePollEmbedError: Eror closing your poll! I could not update the message to display the final results. Please try again later or create a ticket in our support server for additional assistance.
zh-TW.changedVote: You've changed your vote from "$1" to "$2".
zh-TW.noLongerExistsInDatabase: Sorry the poll you are trying to interact with no longer exists in our database please delete the poll message you tried to interact with.
zh-TW.errorUpdatingDatabase: Sorry but there seems to have been some trouble in the database with registering your vote. Please try again or create a ticket in the SimplePollBot support server.
zh-TW.displayPollingDataError: There was an issue somewhere displaying your polling data please reach out immediately to the SimplePollBot support server for assistance.
zh-TW.helpCommandDescription: Information on creating votes / helpful links.
zh-TW.helpDescription: All information is avaliable on our [GitHub](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) or the [Support Discord](https://discord.gg/VZkY8mDJGh).
zh-TW.privacyDescription:
```What Information Is Stored?```messageId, pollsGuildName, pollsGuildId, pollsChannelName, pollsChannelId, pollTitle, pollDescription, pollItem, pollVoteCount, pollViewVotesFlag (public poll or not), pollVoteUserName, pollVoteUserId, pollVoteUserItem, lastInteraction```Why we store the information and how we use it.```All of the information we store is for the functionality of the bot and for future feature additions. The main use of the information stored is to validate votes between users so there's no duplication of votes in the poll. 

The bot is open source and can be viewed by anyone on [the github for the bot](https://github.com/0x29a-blink/pollbot) ```How can I contact you for removal of my data?```Via our [support discord](https://discord.gg/hUge5epA) and creating a ticket there.
zh-TW.privacyFooter: All of this data is temporary and is immediately removed upon the closing of the poll or after 1 month of poll inactivity.
zh-TW.infoCommandDescription: Information and stats about Simple Poll Bot

ko.pollOptionTitleDescription: Sets the title of the poll.
ko.pollOptionDescriptionDescription: The polls description... Create a newline in the poll description by typing \n
ko.pollOptionItemsDescription: Items to vote on. SEPARATE EACH ITEM WITH A COMMA ( , )
ko.pollOptionPublicDescription: Allows you to make the results of the poll public at all times, even before you close the poll.
ko.pollOptionThreadDescription: Attach a thread to the poll?
ko.memberNoPermsAndGuildHasNoRole: Sorry! You currently don't have the "Poll Manager" role or the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission. I attempted to create this role for you but I am lacking the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission. You will need to contact your server administrator for support. You can either ask them to give you the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or you can ask them to give me the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission and you can execute the command again. The bot will create the "Poll Manager" role required and you can ask your server admin to give you it.
ko.roleCreateReason: Automatically creating "Poll Manager" for bot functions.
ko.memberNoPermsAndServerNoRoleCreated: It appears you don't have the permission `MANAGE_GUILD` to create a poll, I've created the role `"Poll Manager"` for you to utilize instead. Simply add the role to yourself and anyone else that you want to have permissions to create and close polls.
ko.memberNoPermsNoRole: Sorry! You don't have the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission or "Poll Manager" role.
ko.pollTooManyItems: Sorry! The poll you tried to create has more than 25 items (%s) unfortunately this is an API limitation and not my own, please remove some items from the poll.
ko.pollHasDuplicates:
Sorry! You attempted to create a poll with duplicate items. Please check your command and avoid putting identical cases.

ex. `one,one`

**NOTE**: If you create a poll like `one, one` it will be valid and upload (due to the space) I can't promise that this will produce stable results for you but if you absolutely require the same poll items that is how you can do it.
